about_the_game:
You came to the silent village in the middle of the woods. It should be your first real commision. But you discovered that man who brought here is gone. All people are gone. And you have to figure out what happened.
Suddenly you realize, your'e not alone. And sometimes it's better to be alone.

Explore and solve mysteries.
In the game the most important thing is solving puzzle like mini games and expolring avaliable area. Gather supplies and keep your flashlight lit. But you have to be carrefull. Dark can be your enemy and friend.

Hidding and fighting
When it comes to fighting, you can hide in dark. Or try to fight back with avaliable weapon. But sometimes ordinary weapon is not enough to fight back.

Survive
During the game you will have many objectives. But the most important thing is survive. You won't help anyone if you die.

name: The Dark Wish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R7 260X or GeForce GTX 650 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3250 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 270X or GTX 760
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
